com.software.reuze

Class d_SetWeightedRandom<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.d_SetWeightedRandom<T>

  • public class d_SetWeightedRandom<T>
extends Object
    This class provides a generic random-weight distribution of arbitrary objects. Add elements with their weight to the set and then use the getRandom() method to retrieve objects. The frequency of returned elements is based on their relative weight. This makes it easy to provide biased preferences. http://www.electricmonk.nl/log/2009/12/23/weighted-random-distribution/
